entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Alliston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:58 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then light early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow at times heavy beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
